meanings.definition: A chemical group consisting of a carbonyl group (C=O) bonded to a methoxy group (-OCH3). It is also known as a methoxycarbonyl group.
meanings.english_definition: A chemical group consisting of a carbonyl group (C=O) bonded to a methoxy group (-OCH3). It is also known as a methoxycarbonyl group.

examples.sentence: The compound contains a carbomethoxyl group.
examples.translation: その化合物はカルボメトキシル基を含んでいる。
